attributes.action: Ask the government to "respect" the will of the British people to leave the EU.
attributes.additional_details: The people of Britain voted to leave the European Union, By a clear win of over 17.2 million votes. QCs and other top British lawyers are set to "Destroy" democracy by forcing the government by law to vote against the will of the people. This is against democracy, this is against the people of Britain, and should not be allowed to take place. I fear that over 17.2 million people will Express their anger by violence and riots! As  Result Of this. We could face riots like back in 2011 but bigger.
attributes.background: I call upon the government to respect and protect the people's vote to leave the European Union. I ask you to protect democracy, and the voice of the British people. As we are aware top "lawyers" in Britain are trying to destroy democracy and  go against the will of the people, we must leave the EU.
